name: wordpress-heroku
description: This project is a template for installing and running [WordPress](http://wordpress.org/) on [Heroku](http://www.heroku.com/). The repository comes bundled with: * [PostgreSQL for WordPress](http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/postgresql-for-wordpress/) * [Amazon S3 and Cloudfront](https://wordpress.org/plugins/amazon-s3-and-cloudfront/) * [WP Sendgrid](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-sendgrid/) * [Wordpress HTTPS](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-https/)
author: abubakr
